name: The Puffer Vest- Womens (WW0031)
description:
This garment does not have internal seam taping.

The fabric is waterproof but with this type of construction, the seams cannot be water tight.

Waterproof, Lightweight, soft, durable polyester fabric
Padded style with non irritant poly fill
Filled stand collar with extra snap button
Generous arm hole so as to wear sweaters underneath
Contrast zip and elastic detail
Front placket can be done up using either snap buttons or zip
Elastic detail at hem to cinch in if desired
Comes in two sizes; S/M & M/L
Dark charcoal lining with allover signature W&W rain print

name: The Raintrench (WW0035)
description:
This garment is not seam taped internally
Waterproof, Lightweight, soft & durable polyester fabric
Hooded with drawstring
Long line style
Loose front & back yokes for extra rain protection
Covered placket with contrast zip detail
Tie waist to cinch in for extra waist shape
Two generous sized patch pockets
Centre back pleat allowing to individually shape to your back
Adjustable snap sleeve cuff detail

name: The Raincape (WW0013)
description:
ONE SIZE FITS ALL

• Large Cape you can wear big and open or cinched and shaped

• Packs away into it's own neat drawstring bag

• Elasticated back and front creates a magic sleeve effect

• Large front Zip pockets double as opening to stick hands right through. Perfect for cycling!

• Fully taped seams making the jacket 100% waterproof

• Lightweight, soft, durable & waterproof polyester fabric 

• Long lined with a scooped back hem and fishtail back opening

• Hooded with elasticated drawstring

• Contrast colour zips (hidden)

name: The Golden Brella
description:
Unisex Style

A simple Black Umbrella opens to reveal a luxe fun golden centre.
This is a double layered style in a long length.
It features gold plated metal work and gold light 
Metallic rain print on the underside and top segment.

92cm X 6cm when closed
90cm umbrella span when open
8 segments for extra strength
Double layered matte polyester fabric
contrast outer segment with light reflective ink
Under layer printed with a light reflective gold  W&W 
signature rain print
Matte black wooden curved handle
All metalwork in gold
W&W reflective flag label on underside

options.name: Black/ Gold

name: LOVE THE RACE- Slimline Brella (WW017)
description:
LIMITED EDITION- LUCKY HORSESHOE PRINT

A long, lightweight and delicate style.
A perspex handle was specifically designed for this brella to create the feeling of light and water.

92cm X 4cm when closed
90cm umbrella span when open
8 segments for extra strength
Single layered matte polyester fabric
Underside features W&W 
signature rain print
Clear perspex curved handle with printed logo
All metalwork in black
W&W reflective flag label on underside

name: Mens Large Double Layered Umbrella- Wooden Handle (WW006)
description:
• 100cm X 6cm when closed 

• Double layered matte polyester fabric 

• 8 segments for extra strength
 
• Spring action opening to aid in wind proofing. This style can flip completely inside out without breaking. It is a defence mechanism of this style

• Contrast underside colour with W&W signature rain print 

• Curved, sturdy natural wood handle

• All metal work is in Black

• W&W Reflective flag label on underside

NOT AVAILABLE FOR SENDING OUTSIDE AUSTRALIA.
FOR INTERNATIONAL;  PLEASE CONTACT US AT shop@wetandwendy.com
